trans-unit.source: Interacts with the parser to build an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Interagisce con il parser per compilare un <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The HtmlSelectBuilder control interacts with the page parser to build an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo HtmlSelectBuilder interagisce con il parser di pagina per creare un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: Use the HtmlSelectBuilder control to customize the parsing of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il controllo HtmlSelectBuilder per personalizzare l'analisi di un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A> property is set to `false` so that white space is always ignored.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A>è impostata su `false` in modo che gli spazi vuoti viene sempre ignorato.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method to determine the type of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's child controls.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A>metodo per determinare il tipo del <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlli figlio del controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the white space literals in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control are to be processed or ignored.
trans-unit.target: Determina se gli spazi vuoti valori letterali in un <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controllo devono essere elaborati o ignorati.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to always ignore white space in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo esegue l'override di <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>sempre ignorare gli spazi vuoti nel metodo il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, indicating that white space in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo restituisce sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, che indica che lo spazio vuoto nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controllo verrà ignorato.

trans-unit.source: Obtains the <xref:System.Type> for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's child controls.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref:System.Type>per il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlli figlio del controllo.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Use the GetChildControlType method to return the <xref:System.Type> of a specified child control in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo GetChildControlType per restituire il <xref:System.Type>di un controllo figlio specificato in un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The tag name of the child control.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del tag del controllo figlio.

trans-unit.source: An array of attributes contained in the child control.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di attributi contenuti nel controllo figlio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's specified child control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>del <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controllo figlio specificato del controllo.</xref:System.Type>
